LanguageData.ELS_ResearchProject_BasicMechSerumProduc: Unlocks the production of empty syringes and recipes to make Healer Mech Serums and Limited Resurrector Mech Serums using them. This technology is a prerequisite for Advanced Mech Serum Production.
LanguageData.ELS_ResearchProject_AdvancedMechSerumPro: Unlocks advanced programming of empty syringes to produce Resurrector Mech Serums and Unlimited Resurrector Mech Serums.
